channel.title: How To Make A PkZone?
channel.description:
Ok well i recenlty posted topic asking how to make a safe zone,they didn't help me...so i finally just started messing around in files...and in the code "nonwild" i deleted everything and put true; and it made the whole server a safezone,WHICH I WANTED BUT i want only edgevill wild,like the wild part of edge that is usually a pkzone,can anyone send me code on how to make only edge wild and everything else a safe zone?
Any help will be greatly appericated. :|

item.title: How To Make A PkZone?

item.description:
